    • Method Detail

      • routeToLagunaRx

        public static SitePin routeToLagunaRx(Net n)
        Routes the current incomplete net to its corresponding RX site. It will add the necessary PIPs to the net to route it, but will not add the site pin.
        Parameters:
        n - The net with a Laguna TX pin source.
        Returns:
        The RX site pin.

      • routeControlSignalsInLagunaSite

        public static void routeControlSignalsInLagunaSite(Cell c,
                                                   Net clk,
                                                   Net rst,
                                                   Net ce)
        Routes the control signals (CLK,CE,RST) for a laguna flop within its site.
        Parameters:
        c - The laguna flop cell to route signals to
        clk - The physical clock net to route
        rst - The physical reset net to route
        ce - The physical ce net to route

      • placeAndRouteLagunaFlopPair

        public static Net placeAndRouteLagunaFlopPair(Design d,
                                              EDIFAbsoluteNet path,
                                              Site txSite,
                                              java.lang.String txElementName)
        Given a logical net and site/bel site, this method will perform the placement and routing of two laguna flops and their inter-site super-long-line routing.
        Parameters:
        d - The current design.
        path - The logical net to implement as an SLR crossing signal
        txSite - The laguna site onto which to place the TX flop
        txElementName - The element/bel site to place the TX flop
        Returns:
        The physical net routed across the super long line

      • placeBUFGCE

        public static Cell placeBUFGCE(Design d,
                               Site s,
                               java.lang.String bufName)
        Places a BUFGCE present in the netlist.
        Parameters:
        d - Design containing BUFGCE
        s - Site onto which to place the BUFGCE
        bufName - Full hierarchical instance name of the BUFGCE

      • placeAndRouteSLRCrossing

        public static void placeAndRouteSLRCrossing(Design d,
                                            Site northStart,
                                            java.lang.String northBusName,
                                            java.lang.String southBusName,
                                            int width)
        Places and routes an SLR crossing given a north and south bus of size width.
        Parameters:
        d - The current design
        northStart - The starting Laguna site to start placement (placement moves north) for the north traveling bus
        northBusName - Full hierarchical net name of the bus to cross SLR in north direction
        southBusName - Full hierarchical net name of the bus to cross SLR in south direction
        width - Width of both north and south buses crossing SLR

      • getLCBPinMappings

        public static java.util.Map<RouteNode,java.util.ArrayList<Pin>> getLCBPinMappings(Net clk,
                                                                                  java.lang.String txClkWire,
                                                                                  java.lang.String rxClkWire)
        Separates clock sinks by direction in a half clock region so they can be driven by independent leaf clock buffers (LCBs).
        Parameters:
        clk - The physical clock net
        txClkWire - The INT tile wire name to use for TX-based clocks
        rxClkWire - The INT tile wire name to use for RX-based clocks
        Returns:
        A map from LCB node to a list of all clk sinks to be driven by the LCB.

      • findCentroid

        public static ClockRegion findCentroid(java.lang.String[] lagunaStarts,
                                       Device dev)

      • customRouteSLRCrossingClock

        public static void customRouteSLRCrossingClock(Design d,
                                               java.lang.String clkName,
                                               java.lang.String[] lagunaStarts,
                                               java.lang.String txClkWire,
                                               java.lang.String rxClkWire,
                                               boolean useCommonCentroid)

      • createBUFGCEAndFlops

        public static void createBUFGCEAndFlops(Design d,
                                        int busWidth,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> busPrefixes,
                                        java.lang.String clkName,
                                        java.lang.String clkInName,
                                        java.lang.String clkOutName,
                                        java.lang.String bufgceInstName)
        Creates the logical netlist of the SLR crosser design.
        Parameters:
        d - Current design
        busWidth - Width of the buses to create
        busPrefixes - Prefixes to use for bus names
        clkName - Name of the clock net
        clkInName - Name of the clock in port
        clkOutName - Name of the clock out port
        bufgceInstName - Name of the BUFGCE instance
